snippet: A judge overseeing the hush-money case against former House speaker Dennis Hastert on Wednesday ordered an independent review of his medical records.
lead_paragraph: A judge overseeing the hush-money case against former House speaker Dennis Hastert on Wednesday ordered an independent review of his medical records.

headline.main: Illinois: Review Ordered for Dennis Hastert’s Medical File
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Review Ordered For Hastert’s Medical File
